name: UltraThinClient

screenshots.caption: UTC Screen with a (non-fullscreen) Unix session in the back, the 3 config and login windows and a minimized windows terminal server session (left bottom)

short_description: A small implementation of a desktop system not requiring any local or remote filesystem installation. Boot it over network or from CD, adapt the keyboard and start new or connect existing sessions on Unix or windows. Requires http://sourceforge.net/projects/weblogin for managing sessions on Unix.
